body_html: Cross-building on Ubuntu for Windows should be possible one day through clang. It will probably require lots of fixes, since Windows binaries are currently built with MSVC. I asked basically the same question when talking in person to @gunan last Monday. Should this be forked into a GH issue of its own, since it has little to do directly with CUDA?

body: Cross-building on Ubuntu for Windows should be possible one day through clang. It will probably require lots of fixes, since Windows binaries are currently built with MSVC. I asked basically the same question when talking in person to @gunan last Monday. Should this be forked into a GH issue of its own, since it has little to do directly with CUDA?
